attributes.action: Recognise the dedication of NHS and social care staff during the covid epidemic.
attributes.additional_details: The 1% uplift proposed in the latest budget is a slap in the face for all those whom the country has depended on during this extraordinary time. Citizens of the United Kingdom admire the NHS more than any other UK institution, and feel no sympathy for a penny pinching attitude at this moment in the country's history. Let us show true gratitude for true sacrifice.
attributes.background: Make an ex gratia payment in 2021 to all NHS staff and social care workers equivalent to 5% of each individual's pay. These people have worked tirelessly, at great personal cost, some even at the cost of their lives. Our government owes them a substantial response.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253

To pay every NHS and Social Care Worker in England a £500 "Thank You" Bonus
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562495

Pay 15% bonus to public facing NHS staff
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/570762
